channel.title: Question over drops!
channel.description:
How do i make a monster/beast drop torva/pernix/virtus?
Sorry, i am confused on how to add the drops :S

item.title: Question over drops!
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“k1ng0frs, post:3, topic:406378”][quote author=Connorg123 link=topic=503378.msg3682477#msg3682477 date=1311628887]

How do i make a monster/beast drop torva/pernix/virtus?

Sorry, i am confused on how to add the drops :S

what base are u using?
[/quote]
what kind of question is that? of course it’s PI what delta server have pernix and torva?[/quote]

Could be a 600+ server. in anyway.

Spawn NPC’s in spawn-config and edit drops in drops.tso or something like that… sorry i’ve had alot to drink and i’m tired

Read full topic
